title: Italian Easter Bread
ingredients: ['5 eggs', '50g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (7g) sachet dried active baking yeast', '375g plain flour', '150ml milk', '30g butter', '2 eggs, room temperature', '120g mixed crystallised fruit, roughly chopped', '50g blanched almonds, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon anise seeds', '2 tablespoons melted margarine', '120g icing sugar', '1 tablespoon full fat milk', '1/8 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons sugar sprinkles']
